title: 원어민 제한 표현 - 조건부 한계
description: 조건과 한계를 자연스럽게 표현하는 원어민 수준의 제한 표현을 구사합니다.
examples: It's good, but there's one catch to it.
It's perfect, but there's one constraint we need to consider.
It's a brilliant idea, provided the budget allows for it.
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 조건부 한계 표현 구사

sentences.kr: 좋긴 한데, 한 가지 단서가 있어.
sentences.en: It's good, but there's one catch to it.
It's perfect, but there's one constraint we need to consider.
It's a brilliant idea, provided the budget allows for it.

sentences.kr: 문제없어 보여. 다만, 시간이 충분하다는 전제하에.
sentences.en: It looks fine, assuming we have enough time.

sentences.kr: 효과적이긴 해. 그런데 몇 가지 조건이 따라.
sentences.en: It's effective, though there are a few conditions attached.

sentences.kr: 가능은 해. 하지만 쉽지는 않을 거야.
sentences.en: It's doable, but it won't be a walk in the park.

sentences.kr: 좋은 계획이야. 단지, 리스크가 따른다는 점만 빼면.
sentences.en: It's a good plan, except for the risks involved.

sentences.kr: 실현 가능해. 다만, 모든 조건이 맞아떨어진다면.
sentences.en: It's feasible, as long as all conditions align perfectly.
